events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago, and the shipping tracking still shows 'in transit' with no updates. It's much later than the estimated delivery date.
System auto-classified this customer message under Delivery Delay cluster due to keywords related to shipping and late delivery.
The case was routed to customer support agent Sarah to handle concerns related to delayed shipping and provide status update.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help with the shipping delay for your laptop order. Let me check the details.
Could you please provide the order number or tracking ID so I can look into the shipment status more accurately for you?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The tracking ID I was given is TRK1234567890, but the carrier website hasn't updated anything for days.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the carrier directly and they reported a delay due to weather in the transit region. Your package should arrive within 3-4 business days.
I appreciate the update, though it's disappointing the delay will take a few more days. Please keep me posted if there are any further changes.
Understood. We will monitor your shipment and notify you immediately if there are additional delays. Thank you for your patience with this matter.
Following up to confirm your order has arrived safely and if there’s anything else we can assist you with regarding your recent purchase.
Since your order was successfully delivered and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us.
